data.name: Tyrann Mathieu video shows danger of a hot car

data.message: Thanks to Tyrann more dog owners will become aware of the danger of hot cars   It should just be plain illegal to leave pets or young kids in cars period.
Love this. Unfortunately, dogs do not have thumbs to open car doors. We, as responsible pet owners need to take care of the animals entrusted to our care.
I recently purchased this man's jersey......I now own 3 Cardinal jerseys....Plummer, Centers and now Mathieu. Stay healthy, and I know that you'll be an impact player!!
REally important message, even with the windows down it gets too hot to leave any living thing in a car.   More malls need to accept dogs!   He will last longer once he is use to the heat.

I seriously think that every parking lot should have a sign displayed DO NOT LEAVE PETS OR CHILDREN UNATTENDED IN A CAR UNDER PENALTY OF FINE no matter what the temperature is outside. It is dangerous and too many tragic and ugly scenarios  can happen to children and/or pets by doing so. We have signs and fines for everything else, so why not a life saving, pro active campaign.

Thank you so much for doing this.  It not only shows pet owners but hopefully parents of little ones that are strapped in car seats that cannot help themselves.  This made it real how hot it gets inside a vehicle in such a short time.  Thanks!!!!!

Thanks Tyrann for making the video, enduring that heat, to show people the deadly results of leaving dogs in cars.  People won't listen to the warnings of others, hopefully they will listen to you !!!
Pet child it dont matter nothing should be left in a hot car

And another police dog just died in a hot car in Georgia, left in their for 10 hours. The handler "forgot" him. I bet he wouldn't have forgotten a carton of ice cream in the car. Wow, humans, where are your brains???
